quest.name: Medicine for Tad The Second
quest.description: Tad, a boy in Semos Hostel, needs help to get his medicine.

offerQuest.message: I'm not feeling well... I need to get a bottle of medicine made. Can you fetch me an empty #flask?

replyCompleted.message: You've already helped me out! I'm feeling much better now.

replyWithOffer.message: You could probably get a flask from #Margaret.

questAccepted.message: Great! Please go as quickly as you can. *sneeze*

questRefused.message: Oh, please won't you change your mind? *sneeze*

replyWithOffer.message: Margaret is the maid in the inn just down the street. So, will you help?

reply.message: Margaret is the maid in the inn just down the street.

remindWithoutItem.message: *cough* Oh dear... I really need this medicine! Please hurry back with the #flask from #Margaret.

greetingWithoutItem.message: Medicine for #Tad? Didn't he tell you to bring a flask?

greeting.message: Ah, I see you have that flask. #Tad needs medicine, right? Hmm... I'll need a #herb. Can you help?

greetingWithoutItem.message: Can you fetch those #herbs for the #medicine?

greeting.message: Okay! Thank you. Now I will just mix these... a pinch of this... and a few drops... there! Can you ask #Tad to stop by and collect it? I want to see how he's doing.

reply.message: The medicine that #Tad is waiting for.

greeting.message: Thanks! I will go talk with #Ilisa as soon as possible.

remindOnBye.message: Goodbye. Don't forget to check on Tad. I hope he's feeling better.

infoQuestOnBye.message: Farewell. Have you met Tad, in the hostel? If you get a chance, please check in on him. I heard he was not feeling well. You can find the hostel in Semos village, close to Nishiya.
